audioText: Les photographes amateurs sauront bientôt utiliser ces nouveaux équipements professionnels.
question: What does the speaker say amateur photographers will soon know how to do?
explanation: The text states 'Les photographes amateurs sauront bientôt utiliser ces nouveaux équipements professionnels' - Amateur photographers will soon know how to use this new professional equipment. 'Sauront' is the future form of 'savoir' (to know how to), third person plural. The distractors test misinterpretation of the skill (develop photographs, organize exhibitions, teach workshops).
